title: What is the best GPS tracking app to monitor children's location? - Quora

response.answer_text: Stay in their subconcious mind…forever….the best possible App ever. Kids are best resonators. Strange part is they don't resonate with your words, they follow your actions. They pick each said and unsaid word, believes in it and behave in exactly same manner. If you want to check, talk strange things about someone and then observe your kids behaviour with that person. You respect ….they respect You love….they love You hate ….they hate Influence them with great thoughts and then no need to track their activities!!!

From where I stand, I would say iKeyMonitor is the best GPS tracking app to monitor children’s location. It is compatible with iOS and Android. You can not only know where your children have bee but also know where they are currently when you cannot find them.
